original_goal: Build high-performance personal blog for Dakota Smith (@daksmitty) with Next.js 16+ SSG, Neo-brutalist dark design, advanced code highlighting, accessibility-first approach, Lighthouse 98+ scores, and Vercel deployment
architectural_decisions: Next.js 16+ with App Router and Turbopack for SSG and optimal performance
Tailwind CSS for styling with custom neo-brutalist theme
MDX for content authoring stored in /content/posts directory
Shiki for advanced syntax highlighting with custom themes
Framer Motion for animations with prefers-reduced-motion support
Giscus for comments loaded asynchronously with IntersectionObserver
Vercel Analytics for simple page view tracking (no cookies)
GitHub repository as single source of truth for content and backup
Schema.org JSON-LD, OpenGraph, and XML sitemaps for SEO
Space Grotesk font family (Google Fonts) for typography
Tree-shaken bundle optimization targeting Lighthouse 98+ scores
WCAG 2.1 AA compliance minimum for accessibility

design_system.style: Neo-brutalist dark theme with accessibility-first principles
